评论详情: I needed comfy pants for work with lots of pockets—these fit the bill. They’re very comfortable and have a lot of storage room in the pockets. I wish they were longer. I’m 5’7 and the pants are a little short. I handwash them so they won’t shrink to an embarrassing length. The dye also fades quickly, but it usually does with this type of fabric.
i was nervous about ordering these and sized up for the baggy look and i love them!! the elastic waistband is a lifesaver and the material is soft and comfortable

So I exchanged n got a medium, they fit like a glove.....i should've stuck with the large because after the 1st wash they SHRANK! Super tight on me, and you can see my ankles, i haven't worn floods since 4th grade! Not cool, but I wear them for work so eh....I'll deal with it. Just buy a size you think ypu are, don't go up, definitely don't go down. After the 1st wash you'll see.

评论概述: I had no idea I could look this good.
评论详情: Amazing practical tailored fit.  Easy to move in.  True to size.  97% cotton for great breathability.  Mid weight twill, great for cooler kitchens.  Pockets do expand, then stay that way. These pants are awesome. They’re super flexible and movement friendly, which is perfect for my job. I went with the size recommended to me by Amazon (Medium) and it fits comfortably. I’d probably size down to a Small if I weren’t buying these for work, I think the fit would be super flattering, form hugging, but still comfortable (if you know what I mean!). I’ve got some room in the waist of the Medium size, making it the perfect amount of loose for my intended use when purchasing. The material of these is really breathable - awesome if you’ve got a job where pants are needed, but you work outside in the heat. I’d say I’m pretty impressed, especially given the price. The only concern I’ve got is that the material does pick up animal hair & lint like crazy, so far it hasn’t been too bad. I use one of those sticky rollers & it picks everything up quick. I’ve got 4 fur-babies at home though, so it might not be so crazy if you only have one or two.

These pants are fine. When I first purchased them I really liked them. Within three wears they are already starting to show some pilling. 评论详情: I needed a pair of pants to use for work that are not leggings that are comfortable so that I can reach up and bend down and not show my goods to the world. And I also didn’t want to get that weird chafing on my hips like I do with most work pants.. these cargoes are butter soft, I stood up, crouch down, stood up, crouch down, stood up and crouch down and not a nary of a crack in sight. I ran through my house ,ran back through it picked up my 10-year-old son threw him into the ceiling fan and ran back to the bedroom, hands down most comfortable pants I own and I have been living in leggings for the last year and a half.
